text: "Generating Story... It is Snow White! The Evil Queen looked into her Magic Mirror. She asked: 'Mirror, Mirror, on the wall, who is the $session.params.word_1 of them all?' The Mirror replied: 'Not you. It is Snow White. She has skin as white as $session.params.word_2, and she has $session.params.word_3 as big as a $session.params.word_4.' The Queen was furious!"

The Mirror replied: 'Not you. It is Snow White. She has skin as white as $session.params.word_2, and she has $session.params.word_3 as big as a $session.params.word_4.' The Queen was furious!
